doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Hembathanthrige Ajith Sirimewan Fernando Alias J.V.P. Ajith Vs Officer-in-Charge Police Station Payagala before Hon. B. Sasi Mahendran, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Hembathanthrige Ajith Sirimewan Fernando Alias J.V.P. Ajith Vs Officer-in-Charge Police Station Payagala
latest_doc_d.legistation: Section 296 of the Penal Code, read with Section 140 of the Penal Code
